description:
Thanks to their restaurant profits, things are looking up for Class 2-F. But if they hope to score some better gear - and keep Mizuki from transferring to another school - there’s one more challenge to be faced: a Summoner Tournament!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 2日目「バカと花火と召喚大会」
Day 2: Idiots, Fireworks and the Summoner Tournament
Dia 2 - Idiotas, Fogos E Torneios De Seres Invocados!
Ninichi-me: Baka to Hanabi to Shoukan Taikai
